assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Katakura & Co-op Agri Corporation engages in the fertilizer, cosmetic, chemical, feed, real estate, and other businesses in Japan. It offers a range of agricultural materials, including chemical fertilizers and compound fertilizers, soil-friendly organic, liquid, molded compound, pesticide, paste, single-substance, and silicate fertilizers, as well as microbial material and seedling culture soil. The company also supplies industrial phosphoric acid, phosphoric acid for food and fertilizers, and sulfuric acid, as well as liquid products and water. In addition, it provides calcium carbonate for feed additives for a wide range of applications, such as poultry farming, pig farming, dairy cattle, beef cattle, and other marine products; provides physicochemical analysis, biologic analysis, quality analysis of agricultural products and crop cultivation tests, etc. Further, the company develops, manufactures, and sells cosmetic raw materials for skin care, hair care, and make-up; inorganic materials, including synthetic mica; and management, operation, and sale of real estate properties. Katakura & Co-op Agri Corporation was founded in 1920 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.
